trans-unit.source: You have requested a change of email address associated with your account. Click on the following link to confirm this change.
If the above button doesn't work, try copying and pasting the URL into your browser. If you still have problems, feel free to contact us.
You want to change your e-mail address

If you change your email address, you will receive an email with a confirmation link if no other account exists with this email address. The change of the e-mail address is only active after a confirmation and only then the new e-mail address is displayed here.

If no other account is linked to the address you entered, you have received an e-mail with a confirmation link to the new e-mail address you entered. Please check your inbox and click on the link. Your new e-mail address will be activated immediately and will be visible here.
The password must consist of at least 6 characters.
Thank you, your password has been changed and is now valid.
I want to delete my account
If you want to delete your account, you can do this at any time simply, quickly and easily with a few clicks here.
Thank you, the profile data has been saved.

Error: Unfortunately we could not change your e-mail address. There may be several reasons for this: Either the link is invalid, the e-mail address has already been changed or the e-mail address is now being used by another account.
Thank you, you have confirmed the change of your e-mail address. Your account is now linked to the following e-mail address:
Error: Either the link is not valid, the account no longer exists or the link has expired. Links to delete the account are only valid for one day.
Thank you, you have confirmed the deletion of your account. The account has just been deleted.
Should the account really now be deleted immediately and irrevocably? Then click on the link in this email.
You want to delete your account
Here are the instructions to delete your account.
Should the account really now be deleted immediately and irrevocably? Then click on the button.
Attention: For security reasons we will send you an e-mail with a confirmation link. As soon as you click on the link in the e-mail, the account will be deleted.
We have just sent you an e-mail to the e-mail address stored with us. As soon as you click on the confirmation link in this e-mail, the account will be deleted immediately.
Error: Either the link is not valid, the account no longer exists or the link has expired. Links to password change are only valid for one hour.
Error: The entries must match and the password must be at least 6 characters long.
Enter your new password and repeat it once. The password must be at least 6 characters long.
Thank you, the password was changed.
An email has been sent to the address stored in your account and contains a link to reset your password. If you do not receive an email, your account or email address was not found.
If the button above does not work, try copying and pasting the URL into your browser. If you continue to have problems, please feel free to contact us.
A request to reset your Admin password has been made. If you did not make this request, simply ignore this email. If you did make this request, please reset your password:
Here are your password reset instructions.
Please enter your username or email address. Instructions for resetting the password will be immediately emailed to you.
Error: This plugin can only be inserted on a page in a protected area. Make sure that only logged in users have access to this area.

An error occurred during logon. You probably entered your username/email or password incorrectly. There is a difference between upper and lower case. Another possibility is that you may have disabled cookies in your web browser.
Unfortunately, you do not have the authorization to log in to this area.
This link is no longer valid. Or it has already been used and the account is already activated.
Your account is now activated. Here again the data with which you are registered with us.
Your account is now activated. We will check your registration and enable it as soon as possible. Here again the data with which you are registered with us.
Thank you very much for your registration
Please review the new user registration.
The user should be enabled? Then click on the following link.
The user doesn't fulfill the needed criterias and should be rejected? Then click on the following link.
Hints: The links provided in this emails has to be used to accpet or reject the registration. Otherwise the user won't get a notification email.
The registration was rejected. A notification email is send to the user.
The registration was accepted. A notification email is send to the user.
Error! The registration wasn't found, or the account is already accepted/rejected.
Thank you for your interest and your registration on our website. With the following link you can now activate your account:
Your registration will be reviewed and your account will be enabled as soon as possible.
Thank you for your interest and your registration on our website. Unfortunately does your registration not fulfill the needed critery an was rejected.

Hints: If you do not confirm your account within 3 days, we will automatically delete all data again. If your mailbox is not reachable, if you enter an invalid e-mail or if the confirmation e-mail is rejected for other reasons, this account will also be removed automatically within the next few hours.
Your registration on our website was rejected.
Here again as a reminder your data:
Someone has just tried to use your email address to create a new account, so we want to inform you with this email. If you did this yourself, you can request a new password here:
Your e-mail address has just been used again for registration.
I agree to the terms and conditions
I have read the data protection information
At this e-mail address you will receive a link to confirm your account.
You are already registered? Login here
The password must consist of at least 6 characters.
Choose a username with at least 3 characters. This may contain letters and numbers. Special characters and spaces are not allowed.
We have now sent an e-mail to the address you provided with a link to confirm your account. Also check your spam folder, sometimes emails get lost there. Here are your details again:

Hints: If you do not confirm your account within 3 days, we will automatically delete all data again. If your mailbox is not reachable, if you enter an invalid e-mail or if the confirmation e-mail is rejected for other reasons, this account will also be removed automatically within the next few hours.
Thank you very much for your registration
The username must be at least 3 and at most 20 characters long.
Registration with this e-mail address is not possible.
The user name must not contain any special characters.
The selected user name already exists.
This e-mail address has no valid format.
The password must be at least 6 characters long.
